data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tagane, Shuichiro, Dang, Van Son, Toyama, Hironori, Naiki, Akiyo, Hidetoshi Nagamasu,, Yahara, Tetsukazu, Tran, Hop (2015): Aporosatetragona Tagane & V. S. Dang (Phyllanthaceae), a new species from Mt. Hon Ba, Vietnam. PhytoKeys 57: 51-60, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.57.6347, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.57.6347
